processors.name: Set File Attributes
processors.annotationData:
<criteria>
    <flowFilePolicy>USE_CLONE</flowFilePolicy>
    <rules>
        <actions>
            <attribute>header</attribute>
            <id>48864ffd-daff-4ed7-b9bc-070e8f2b9b7e</id>
            <value>IMEI,yyyyMMddhhmmss,lon,lat,speed,dir,alt,alarmCode</value>
        </actions>
        <comments></comments>
        <conditions>
            <expression>${filename:startsWith('tracking_data_x')}</expression>
            <id>0628e661-de66-4bb2-ab8d-56d67b610bea</id>
        </conditions>
        <id>160296c1-494a-400e-bac1-2b98e15b05f5</id>
        <name>mi-c3 | etl data x</name>
    </rules>
    <rules>
        <actions>
            <attribute>jolt_spec</attribute>
            <id>fd871d5a-2ad5-4a0f-85de-7c8aef429ef0</id>
            <value>{
    "operation": "shift",
    "spec": {
      "data": {
        "*": ""
      }
    }
}</value>
        </actions>
        <comments></comments>
        <conditions>
            <expression>${filename:startsWith('tracking_data_y')}</expression>
            <id>0628e661-de66-4bb2-ab8d-56d67b610bea</id>
        </conditions>
        <id>07425464-bf65-487e-a2ce-e095e2b41f92</id>
        <name>mi-c3 | etl data y</name>
    </rules>
</criteria>

Log level when file not found.name: Log level when file not found
Log level when file not found.displayName: Log level when file not found

max-performance-metrics.name: max-performance-metrics
max-performance-metrics.displayName: Maximum Number of Files to Track
